question: 斎場
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>purification</kanji> <kanji>location</kanji> is the place where you perform purification on people. Who needs the most purification? The dead. Where do you purify them? In a <vocabulary>funeral hall</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You learned the on'yomi for <ja>場</ja> when you learned <ja>入場</ja> ages ago.
